channel.title: Git on Red Hat AppDev Setup Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Red Hat AppDev Setup Guide

item.title: Git Ignore
item.description: Git Ignore (global) Create the file ~/.gitignore as shown below to not track files that are almost always ignored in all Git repositories. # Folder view configuration files .DS_Store Desktop.ini # Thumbnail cache files ._* Thumbs.db # Files that might appear on external disks .Spotlight-V100 .Trashes # Compiled Python files *.pyc # Compiled C++ files *.out # Application specific files venv node_modules .sass-cache Or simply download macOS specific .
